sentences.sentence: Across Britain, burnt toast will be served to mothers in bed this morning as older sons and daughters to deliver their supermarket bunches of flowers.
sentences.translation: 这天早上，全英国的妈妈都会在床上吃烤面包片，而大一点的儿子女儿们会送上在超市买的一束束鲜花。

sentences.sentence: She wore her hair in bunches.
Jumping away, she brought Clara some bunches of fragrant herbs and put them in her lap.
sentences.translation: 她跑到一旁，给克拉拉拔了几束芳香的嫩草，放在她的腿上。
